entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
